sentences.english: Expression of JAM-C in different tissues of mice with acute necrotizing pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 在小鼠急性坏死性胰腺炎模型不同组织中的表达。

sentences.english: It can lead to inflammation of the pancreas, which increases your risk of diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 它能导致胰腺炎，能增加你患糖尿病的危险。

sentences.english: Conclusions Ulinastatin has a better effect on mild acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论乌司他丁对急性轻症胰腺炎有较好的疗效。

sentences.english: Aim To observe and compare the efficacy of ulinastatin(UTI) and gabexate mesilate(GM) on treating acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的对比乌司他丁和加贝酯对急性胰腺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the recent pathogenetic researches on the acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结急性胰腺炎发病机理的研究进展。

sentences.english: Objective The discussion health educates to the acute pancreatitis patient obeys the medical behavior the influence.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨健康教育对急性胰腺炎患者遵医行为的影响。

sentences.english: Objectives To observe the effect of Ulinastatin(UTI) on acute pancreatitis (AP).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨乌司他丁治疗急性胰腺炎的临床效果。

sentences.english: It was found that SF had beneficial effects on acute haemorrhagic necrotic pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 黄腐酸钠对急性出血坏死性胰腺炎有明显疗效。

sentences.english: Economic evaluation of ulinastatin vs octreotide in treatment of acute pancreatitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的对比乌司他丁和加贝酯对急性胰腺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Chronic forms of pancreatitis can devastate a person’s life over many years.
sentences.chinese: 慢性胰腺炎则折磨人多年。

sentences.english: What is the remedial method with acute best pancreatitis?
sentences.chinese: 急性胰腺炎最好的治疗方法是什么？

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of octreotide in acute mild pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察奥曲肽治疗急性轻症胰腺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: A presumptive diagnosis of pancreatitis can be made based on a history and physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 胰腺炎可以根据病史和体格检查作出初步诊断。

sentences.english: The main clinical manifestation was the light pain in upper left abdomen, sometimes accompanied with acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 临床主要表现左上腹隐痛，偶有急性胰腺炎史。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis of biliary pancreatitis, diagnosis and treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胆源性胰腺炎的发病机制，诊断和治疗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of early EST treatment for biliary acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨早期EST治疗急性胆源性胰腺炎的疗效。
